definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: The line was going out fast but steadily and the fish was not panicked.
sentences.chinese: 釣索朝水中溜得既快又穩，闡明這魚並不受驚。

sentences.english: To clarify the safety of Monascus and Chinese traditional medicine synbiotics.
sentences.chinese: 闡明紅曲黴與健胃中藥合生素的安全性。

sentences.english: By means of comparative analysis in order, this paper puts special emphasis on clarifying their dual characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 本文將通過逐項對比分析，着重闡明二者的對偶性。

sentences.english: This article clarifies the value of governance to application development teams.
sentences.chinese: 本文會嚮應用程序開發團隊闡明治理的價值。

sentences.english: Throughout, she illustrates her analysis with excerpts from discussions.
sentences.chinese: 自始至終，她摘引討論內容來闡明她的分析。

sentences.english: The basic requirements in nuclear safety review are clarified for class 1E cables of nu- clear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 闡明對核電廠1E級電纜核安全審查的基本要求。

sentences.english: However, much more research will be necessary to clarify the pharmacology of indigo naturalis.
sentences.chinese: 但是，茯靈的藥理作用要闡明，還需要大量的研究。

sentences.english: That's officially spelt out in the latest five-year plan.
sentences.chinese: 這在最新的五年計劃裏都正式闡明瞭。

sentences.english: By introducing a typical case this paper expounds the common reasons for disbanding a corporation compulsorily in judicial procedure.
sentences.chinese: 以典型案例作引子，闡明瞭公司司法解散的理由。

sentences.english: The Christian doctrine of creation finds its expression within the Church.
sentences.chinese: 而基督教的創世論教義是在教會內得到闡明的。

sentences.english: Whether caffeine banishes cellulite is less clear.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡因是否可以減少脂肪組織尚未闡明。

sentences.english: The cases are analyzed in order to illustrate the feasibility of wastewater treatment with thermophilic bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 通過實例闡明瞭利用嗜熱菌處理廢水的可行性。

sentences.english: Clarify the oil painting art language real meaning and the existence values of the critical appearance.
sentences.chinese: 闡明油畫藝術語言臨界狀態的真正意義和存在價值。

sentences.english: Hiddink's plans should be clarified shortly.
sentences.chinese: 希丁克的計劃應該被簡短的闡明。

sentences.english: First of all, the author expounded that it is necessary to study the supervising mode inside company of our country .
sentences.chinese: 首先，闡明瞭研究公司內部監督模式問題的必要性。

sentences.english: At the beginning, the renamed history of Guazhou was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 首先，闡明瞭瓜州縣更名的歷史沿革。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
